subjectLines: Quick Q about Boswell's collect & deliver
27 years in Holborn — one upgrade missing?
pitch.message:
Hi,

I was looking at Boswell Laundrette's pricing page — impressive range, from £4.50 shirt service up to wedding dresses and leather care.

With that many options, do you find customers often call or email just to ask "what's this going to cost?" or "do you collect from my area?"

I work with laundry businesses to add a simple AI chatbot that handles those questions 24/7 — instant quotes, collection bookings, even corporate enquiries. Similar businesses see dozens of after-hours conversations each month that would otherwise go unanswered.

Worth a quick chat to see if it fits?

Cheers,
Jorge

outreach.recommendedSubject: Quick Q about Boswell's collect & deliver
outreach.reasoning: Direct email found on contact page allows personalized subject line and is more professional for a B2B approach to an established 27-year business

alternativeChannels.note: Service request form available but designed for laundry orders, not sales enquiries
Active page, good for casual follow-up
Direct line available but interrupts busy operation
